description: This file implements authentication services for a backend API using FastAPI. It includes functions for password hashing, verifying, JWT token creation, decoding, and user authentication dependencies.

methods.name: str get_password_hash(password: str)
methods.description: Hashes a plaintext password using bcrypt.

methods.name: bool verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str)
methods.description: Verifies a plaintext password against its hash.

methods.name: str _create_token( subject: str, *, expires_minutes: int, token_type: str, settings: Optional[Settings] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, )
methods.description: Creates a JWT token with subject, expiry, and optional claims.

methods.name: str create_access_token(subject: str, *, settings: Optional[Settings] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Creates a short-lived access token for a user.

methods.name: str create_refresh_token(subject: str, *, settings: Optional[Settings] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Creates a long-lived refresh token for a user.

methods.name: Tuple[str,str] create_token_pair_for_user(user: User, *, settings: Optional[Settings] = None)
methods.description: Generates a pair of access and refresh tokens for a given user.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] decode_token(token: str, *, settings: Optional[Settings] = None)
methods.description: Decodes and validates a JWT token, raising HTTPException if invalid.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] get_token_payload(token: str, *, expected_type: Optional[str] = None, settings: Optional[Settings] = None)
methods.description: Decodes a token and optionally asserts its type.

methods.name: User get_current_user( token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme), db: Session = Depends(get_db), settings: Settings = Depends(get_settings), )
methods.description: FastAPI dependency that fetches the current authenticated user based on the bearer token.
